'''Hidden Exploration Objectives'''  ''(unofficial name)'', or '''HEO''' for short, are many things around the world of [[Teyvat]] that are not normal [[Exploration]], but are not officially recognized as [[Quests]] or marked in any way. They tend to be associated with ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievements.

They can be divided into the types "Quest-Like" and "Unordered".

==Quest-Like==
These follow the structure of a normal quest, with a defined set of steps, and explicitly present some lore.
